scripts.clean-ios: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build/* && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.clean-droid: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf android/build/* && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn install
